Everything Your Shop Needs

Powerful features, simple interface. Built specifically for Indian retailers.

üõí Billing

Lightning-Fast POS Billing

Create bills in seconds, not minutes. Scan barcodes, tap products, or speak to search. Smart cart with automatic calculations. Multiple payment methods in one screen.

  • Barcode scanning with phone camera
  • Voice input ‚Äî say product name to search
  • Smart product search with instant results
  • Quick amount buttons for fast cash billing
  • Auto-calculate total, change, and tax
  • Cash, UPI, and Credit (Udhar) payments
  • Bill number auto-generation (Bill #1, #2...)
  • PDF receipt generation and sharing

üì¶ Inventory

Complete Product Management

Add products in seconds ‚Äî manually, by scanning barcode, or importing from CSV. Track stock levels in real-time. Get alerts before you run out.

  • 8 unit types: Piece, Kg, Gram, Liter, ML, Pack, Box, Dozen
  • Purchase price & selling price tracking
  • Low stock alerts ‚Äî never run out of bestsellers
  • Barcode assignment and lookup via API
  • Product images for quick visual identification
  • Category-based organization and filtering
  • CSV import ‚Äî add 100s of products at once
  • CSV export ‚Äî backup your catalog anytime

üìí Khata

Digital Credit Ledger

Replace your paper udhar register with a digital khata. Track every rupee, send reminders, and maintain customer relationships. No more disputes.

  • Add customers with name and phone number
  • Track credit balance (udhar) in real-time
  • Record payments instantly
  • Send WhatsApp reminders for pending amounts
  • View complete transaction history per customer
  • Filter: All customers / With Due / Fully Paid
  • Overdue alert ‚Äî auto-flag after 30+ days
  • Share customer statements via WhatsApp/SMS

üìä Reports

Sales Analytics & Insights

Know your numbers. See what's selling, track daily trends, and understand your business performance with beautiful visual charts.

  • Today / This Week / This Month time filters
  • Total sales, bill count, and average bill value
  • Top selling products with units sold
  • Visual charts for sales trends
  • Recent bills list with payment details
  • Export reports as PDF documents
  • Revenue and profit tracking

üñ®Ô∏è Printing

Bluetooth Thermal Printing

Print professional receipts instantly via Bluetooth thermal printer. No wires, no setup hassle. Works with standard 58mm thermal printers available everywhere.

  • 58mm thermal paper support (most common size)
  • Bluetooth wireless ‚Äî no cables needed
  • Auto-print option ‚Äî print on bill completion
  • Print preview before printing
  • Receipt shows shop name, GST, items, total
  • Custom receipt footer message
  • Also generates PDF for digital sharing
  • Share receipt via WhatsApp directly

üé§ Voice

Voice-Powered Search

Can't type? Just speak! Say the product name and Tulasi Stores finds it instantly. Works in Hindi, English, and Telugu. Hands-free billing for busy moments.

  • Speak product name to search
  • Works in Hindi, English, and Telugu
  • Hands-free operation for busy times
  • Fast and accurate speech recognition

üì° Offline

Works Without Internet

No network? No problem. Tulasi Stores works completely offline. Create bills, manage products, and run your shop without any internet connection. Data syncs when you're back online.

  • Full billing without internet
  • Products and inventory available offline
  • Automatic sync when connection returns
  • No data loss ‚Äî ever
  • Connection status indicator in app
  • Perfect for areas with poor connectivity

üé® Customize

Themes & Customization

Make Tulasi Stores yours. Choose light or dark theme, adjust font size for comfort, configure billing settings, receipt messages, and much more.

  • Light / Dark / System theme modes
  • Font size scaling (0.8x to 1.4x) for comfort
  • Custom receipt footer message
  • GST toggle and configurable tax rate (default 5%)
  • Auto-print on/off
  • Print preview toggle
  • Sound effects toggle
  • Notification preferences

Complete Settings Control

Every aspect of Tulasi Stores is configurable to match your shop's needs.

üè™

Shop Settings

Shop name, owner name, phone, address, GST number, shop logo, and profile image.

üßæ

Billing Settings

GST toggle, tax rate, receipt footer text, auto-print, print preview, bill format.

üñ®Ô∏è

Hardware Settings

Bluetooth printer pairing, bill size (58mm), test print, connection status.

üé®

Theme Settings

Light/dark mode, font size scaling (0.8x‚Äì1.4x), accent colors, system mode.

üë§

Account Settings

Profile management, email, sign out, data management, backup and export.

üåê

General Settings

Language selection (EN/HI/TE), sounds, notifications, currency, date format.

üìã

GST-Ready Invoices

Professional, tax-compliant receipts that satisfy GST requirements. Your GST number printed on every bill.

  • GST number on every receipt
  • Configurable tax rate (default 5%)
  • Professional bill format
  • PDF export for tax records
üîí

Enterprise-Grade Security

Your business data is protected with industry-standard security measures, backed by Google Firebase.

  • Firebase Cloud encryption & backup
  • Firebase App Check protection
  • Crashlytics monitoring
  • Performance tracking & optimization
